data.name: RPG Maker MV - Welcome to My Nightmare
data.detailed_description:
Have you been worried about your game’s music being too cheery and upbeat for the story’s tone? Then it’s time to check out the Darkest Hour music pack! ayato sound create’s newest pack contains 20 tracks to give your game the right background music for your moodier scenes.

Features:

* 20 songs
* ogg, mp3, m4a, wav, and looping ogg file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

Tracklist:

story of
Irritation
dizzy
Pain
No trust
Saw
piano
welcome to my nightmare
Gravity
distortion
Escape
Enter Nirvana
recollection
after life
Sharp objects
death
decadence
destiny
Ghost dance
Reincarnation
